Hi, I'm Lizzie. I'm a developer advocate at Cloudflare. And I'm Nick. I'm a developer experience engineer at WorkOS.
Yes. So, at Cloudflare, I make a lot of AI demos, AI MCP servers. Anyone here also making any of those?

Yeah. And we're we're moving so fast with all of this and having fun getting it to do things. Uh we we do like authorization and user management. And like the the main point of this talk is to really help uh drive the idea that we need like the same kind of credentials and uh authorization that we do with user-facing projects. We need the agents to do that as well as a start and then we have a lot of places that we can go with this as we get more fine-grained. Um but really the the point is that OAuth really just isn't for humans anymore. It's for our agents acting on our behalf.
